lead.title: Qualification in the Rosneft Group Companies

crumbs.text: Qualification in the Rosneft Group Companies

bannerText.title: Supplier verification procedure
text: Qualification in the Rosneft Group Companies is a procedure of Supplier verification for compliance with special requirements confirming the possibility of timely supply of high-quality products of a certain type, including requirements to have special experience, capabilities, resource base, necessary permits, and other requirements.
